Futhi The grandchild of UpCyclin

Please scroll to experience the animations

Meaning:Again.

Futhi is an isiZulu term that translates to “again”. This is a fitting name as our company utilizes mostly discarded or pre-loved clothing items to create new and dynamic capsule collections that provide the consumer with variety without having purchased large volumes of clothes. Futhi is what we like to call the love child of sustainable consumption and cutting edge fashion.

Newchoices

Where UpcycLin has created dialogue and asked the hard questions to the consumer about their habits and business about their practices, Futhi acts as a den of exploration where the consumer can make new choices about their fashion and clothing consumption.

But the more we cling to the illusion of control, the more we suffer. The art of letting go is not a skill to be learned, but a state of being to be realized. It is the recognition that we are not separate from the world around us, but a part of it, and that our true power lies not in trying to dominate it, but in surrendering to it.

Scrap yarn makes up a large portion of materials that end up in landfills,
however when that yarn is repurposed it can produce beautiful creations.
We give the consumer the sustainable
option in the sea of “fast” options.

"We, the public,are the necessary catalist to drive companies towards putting Planet over profit."
